It turns out that you are right.

rich-text.name: Pinyin
rich-text.i: Shì shí zhèngmíng, nǐ shì duì de.

card.text: 他指着前面，高兴地说：“你看，小王来了。”
He pointed to the front and said happily: "Look, Xiao Wang is here."

rich-text.name: Pinyin
rich-text.i: Tā zhǐzhe qiánmiàn, gāoxìng de shuō: Nǐ kàn, xiǎo wáng láile.

card.text: 学校周围有一大片森林。
There is a large forest around the school.

rich-text.name: Pinyin
rich-text.i: Xuéxiào zhōuwéi yǒu yī dàpiàn sēnlín.

card.text: 旧社会里，有的有钱人的房子屋顶很高。
In the old society, some wealthy people had high roofs.

rich-text.name: Pinyin
rich-text.i: Jiù shèhuì lǐ, yǒu de yǒu qián rén de fángzi wūdǐng hěn gāo.

card.text: 客厅正面的墙上，正中挂着父的画像。
On the front wall of the living room, there is a portrait of the father in the middle.

rich-text.name: Pinyin
rich-text.i: Kètīng zhèngmiàn de qiáng shàng, zhèngzhòng guàzhe fù de huàxiàng.
